title: Real-time AI Chat Translation Comes to Roblox
description: The new feature instantly translates chat messages between 16 languages, enabling players to connect globally in their native tongues.

title: South Korea Arrests Haru Invest Executives Over Alleged $826M Embezzlement
description: The firm, which claimed to offer double-digit yields on cryptocurrencies, abruptly shut down user withdrawals in June 2023.

title: Solana blockchain is down - no blocks since 10:22 UTC
description:
The Solana network experienced a major outage on Feb. 6, 10:22 UTC and engineers from across the ecosystem are investigating an outage on mainnet-beta.

Solana Mainnet-Beta is experiencing downtime in block production as block progression is currently halted, and core engineers and validators are actively investigating. The Solana Blockchain Explorer flashing a “major outage” on the mainnet.

Users on social media started to notice that the Solana blockchain hasn’t produced a block in over 25 minutes, which is considerably long considering Solana has a block production time of 400 milliseconds.

This is not the first time the Solana blockchain has faced a network outage or downtime in block production; the network has been plagued with multiple downtimes over the past few years. The latest outage will be the 11th time in the past two years.

Read more

title: Bitcoin miners slam US government planned survey as ‘Operation Chokepoint 3.0’
description:
The U.S. authorities’ planned survey of Bitcoin miners’ electricity usage has drawn steep criticism from the mining community, describing it as the genesis of “Operation Chokepoint 3.0.” Miners criticize the survey. Riot Platforms CEO Jason Les said the survey was “politically motivated, unlawful, and discriminatory” against the miners. According to him, the survey does not […]
